 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָדַר‎</span>] **verb** probably (si vera lectio) help (Aramaic loan-word, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲדַר‎</span> (rare) = Hebrew  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עזר‎</span> q. v.; &gt; [[BDB#Thes|Thes]], assuming meaning ***arrange, order***); — 

**Qal** ***Infinitive cstr***. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַעֲדֹר‎</span> [[1Chr.12.34|1Chr 12:34]] ([[BDB#Baer|Baer]] [[BDB#Gi|Ginsb]]; [[BDB#van d.H.|van d. H.]] v.[[1Chr.12.33|1Chr 12:33]] this meaning also [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Vg|ᵑ9]]); but &lt; Manuscripts <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַעֲוֺר‎</span> (compare v.[[1Chr.12.18|1Chr 12:18]] v.[[1Chr.12.22|1Chr 12:22]] v.[[1Chr.12.23|1Chr 12:23]], [[BDB#van d.H.|van d. H.]] v.[[1Chr.12.17|1Chr 12:17]] v.[[1Chr.12.21|1Chr 12:21]] v.[[1Chr.12.22|1Chr 12:22]]), so [[BDB#Kau|Kau]] [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]]; ***Participle*** plural construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֹדְרֵי מַעֲרָכָה‎</span> v.[[1Chr.12.39|1Chr 12:39]] ([[BDB#van d.H.|van d. H.]] v.[[1Chr.12.38|1Chr 12:38]]), read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֹרְכֵי‎</span> (q. v. v.[[1Chr.12.34|1Chr 12:34]]) [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Kau|Kau]]; see <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ערך‎</span>. 



 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָדַר‎</span>] **verb** ==hoe== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; so Arabic (in Syria) <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***pick, hoe***, [[BDB#Cuche|Cuche]] (<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> also [[BDB#Dozy|Dozy]]<sup>ii. 101 b</sup>); compare [[BDB#Fl|Fl]]<sup>Kl. Schr. ii. 628</sup>); — 

**Niph\`al** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֹא יֵעָדֵר‎</span> [[Isa.5.6|Isa 5:6]] ***it*** (the vineyard) ***shall not be hoed*** (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִזָּמֵר‎</span>); 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כַּמַּעְדֵּר יֵעָדֵר֑וּן‎</span> [[Isa.7.25|Isa 7:25]] which ***used to be hoed with the hoe*** (subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֶהָרִים‎</span>). 



 III. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָדַר‎</span>] **verb** **Niph\`al** ==be lacking, fail== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***remain*** or ***lag behind***); — 

**Niph\`al** ***Perfect***, all with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֹא‎</span> 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֶעְדַּר לָהֶם‎</span> [[1Sam.30.19|1Sam 30:19]] not anything ***was lacking to them***; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֶעְדָּ֑ר‎</span> none ***was lacking*** [[2Sam.17.22|2Sam 17:22]]; [[Isa.40.25|Isa 40:25]] of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>, [[Zeph.3.5|Zeph 3:5]] ***he doth not fail***; 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֶעְדָּ֔רָה‎</span> [[Isa.34.16|Isa 34:16]] no wild beast is lacking. ***Participle*** feminine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֶעְדֶּ֫רֶת‎</span> [[Isa.59.15|Isa 59:15]] truth has become ***lacking***. **Pi\`el** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֹא יְעֲדְּרוּ דָּבָּ֑ר‎</span> [[1Kgs.5.7|1Kgs 5:7]] ***they left nothing lacking***.
